name: TOKYO 95 - Based on a real story
name_original: TOKYO 95 - Based on a real story
description:
STORY

On 20 March 1995, members of the cult movement Aum Shinrikyo released sarin on three lines of the Tokyo Metro on the morning during rush hour, killing 12 people, severely injuring 50, and 6000 others.

This game is based on this event and allows the player to control two characters who really lived this attack : a metro agent and a woman.

The story is based on an essay called "Underground" from Haruki Murakami and take place in the Kasumigaseki Station as it is according to the references.

CONTROL WSAD / ZQSDMoveEInteractRMBZoomESCPause
NOTE

The game was made for my graduation project with two other people : Valentine Normand and Garance Zajdlic.

Also, because it was for a school project and me and the team are french, the game is not available in english.
